sentences.en: An outsider might misconstrue the nature of the relationship.
sentences.cn: 外人也许会误解这种关系的本质。

sentences.en: Do not misconstrue it as an effort to exert force or pressure.
sentences.cn: 不要把它误解为需要卯尽全力或施加压力的苦差事.

sentences.en: His behaviour could easily be misconstrued.
It is easy to misconstrue confidence as arrogance.
sentences.cn: 很容易将信心误解为傲慢。

trans.tran_en: to  misunderstand  something that someone has said or done
